attributes.action: provide legislation that prevents media coverage of celebrity/regular people's weight/looks being portrayed in a negative manner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am watching a programme on TV about anorexic, pregnant women!  As a new mum and a recovered anorexic, I am horrified by this.  And as there appears to be a growing trend towards eating disorders in this country, I think as much effort should be put into preventing them, as is put into "the obesity crisis".  We are constantly told how the media is having a negative impact on young peoples self-esteem, and this is having a backlash.  Maybe it's time to stop this?  Get back to some old-fashioned values that don't revolve around some celebrity "showing off" they're unhealthy size-zero.  There will just be another mountain of health problems in 10 years time if this trend continues.
